name: strong
features: Double Reinforced Palm: Offers superior feel & durability while remaining soft
0.9mm Cabretta Leather: Softest leather for great feel
Double Inverse Cuff: Increased wrist support, injury protection & power
Superior Craftsmanship: Handmade for buttery soft & durable gloves
Designed to Fit: No unnecessary stitching for max durability
Built for T-Ball : Designed specifically to keep young players comfortable & focused during games
Moisture Management : Nike Dri-FIT technology wicks away sweat for quicker evaporation & lasting comfort
Comfort Fit : Smooth material creates a soft, comfortable feel on hands
Durable Construction : Built to withstand repeated use during practices & games
